subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3905 has been delivered
description_text:
Hello!

I received the package, but unfortunately upon opening the package I
realized that it shipped without the baseplate. What are my options to
resolve this?

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Tommy Boileau,    We sincerely apologize for the delay caused by the shortage of baseplate stock in our U.S. warehouse. We will ship your order immediately upon receiving the item today.
Sounds great. Thank you for the update. Sent from my iPhone
